original_title: Milton Berle's Low Impact/High Comedy Workout
overview: Classic comedian Milton Berle and senior fitness expert Merrily Smith join forces to present a low-impact workout certified safe for seniors up to 100 years of age by experts from the Aerobics and Fitness Association. Gentle workouts are interspersed with "Uncle Miltie's" wisecracks and impressions of fitness celebrities.
tagline: It's NEVER Too Late to Start Exercising!
title: Milton Berle's Low Impact/High Comedy Workout
